definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: About one minute later, Jay was at her door with screwdriver in hand and took the door off the hinges.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿，杰伊拿着螺丝刀把门上的小五金零件卸下了。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a screwdriver with a clamper.
sentences.chinese: 一种带夹持器的螺丝刀。

sentences.english: Have you ever used a hammer and screwdriver to loosen a nut from a bolt?
sentences.chinese: 您是否曾经使用一个锤子和螺丝刀来卸下一个螺母？

sentences.english: He gouged her cheek with a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 他用螺丝刀戳她的脸颊。

sentences.english: And all you need is a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 你所需要的只是一把螺丝刀。

sentences.english: A couple of screwdrivers rolled off my fender mat onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 两支螺丝刀从我的挡泥板垫上滚到了地板上。

sentences.english: Regular stud with screw-driver slot sealed or unsealed.
sentences.chinese: 正规螺柱，带螺丝刀槽可选密封或未密封。

sentences.english: A small screwdriver or similar tool is required to adjust trimmers.
sentences.chinese: 一个小螺丝刀或类似的工具是需要调整机。

sentences.english: Scientists also went with their experiments, engineers with their screwdrivers.
sentences.chinese: 科学家和工程师也会各自带着实验设备和螺丝刀随行。

sentences.english: It replaces many of the meters and screwdrivers of yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 它取代了很多的米和螺丝刀昨天。

sentences.english: Hammering was faster than using a screwdriver, she explained.
sentences.chinese: 用锤子要比螺丝刀快一些，她解释道。

sentences.english: People never lack a screwdriver; they need to hang a painting on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 人们从来不缺螺丝刀，他们需要的只是将画挂在墙上。

sentences.english: Specififications the same as for equivalent models in the BL series.
sentences.chinese: 规格与BL系列同型号的螺丝刀相同。

sentences.english: A clamper is arranged on a tool bar of a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 它是在螺丝刀刀杆上设置一个夹持器。

sentences.english: No problem, the screwdriver can do that ...
The thief is precisely with the screwdriver, has pried open the wristwatch counter.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼正是用这把螺丝刀，撬开了手表柜台。

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
